data.title: Best Movies and TV shows Like Julius Caesar
data.meta_description: Movies and TV Shows Similar to Julius Caesar: Attila (2001), Cleopatra (1999), The Fall of the Roman Empire (1964), Augustus: The First Emperor (2003), Nero (2004), Tut (2015), El Cid (1961), To Kill a King (2003), I, Claudius (1976), Spartacus (2004)
